title: New doodles, lol.
content:
I posted some new doodles, check em' out! 


p.s. All of the titles Benji came up with himself, lol.

title: Shitpost Sunday, lol.
content:
It's been a pretty good weekend. I played a show with the band yesterday at Toyota Music Factory in Dallas. It was a great because the wife and the boy got to come; it was Benji's first time getting to see us play, let alone see his dad play so that was awesome.

As for today, it's just the typical Sunday chores and getting ready for the upcoming work week, along with a rack of ribs smoking on the Traeger. And as for work, it's been a bit stale in terms of cool projects to work on and, well, anything new really - it's been report after report after report here lately. However, I am always learning more with Power BI and new ways to extract, manipulate, and visualize data, and that should be my takeaway. As he always does, the director will swoop by our desks any day now with some new grand idea, so I shouldn’t let a week or two of report building put a damper on the work life.

I’m hoping to get some time this week to work on the site a little bit more, I have some ideas for new stylings and pages that I think will make it even more badass than it already is! We’re talking list items, images in posts, gifs in posts, videos in posts, etc. I started the site with the idea of it being solely text, but of course that’s evolving into something much more. I also plan to throw up some more doodles in the next few days while I continue to clean and organize my home office.

That’s it for the first Shitpost Sunday, there will be many more to come.

-Dad

title: Benji's Doodles, lol.
content:
I've been wanting a place to store my son's doodles because they keep piling up on a shelf in my office and, well, what better place than to store them here on my site. I added a new table to my Postgres database to store my image links and made a script that will manage my images in the database. Things are starting to come together at hi-dad.lol I tell ya!

I've been doing some more editing to the CSS stylings of this thing and added a nav burger bar. If you click the burger, you'll be able to navigate to the archive and to the newly added 'Doodles' page as well.

title: AI Drake, lol.
content: Drake made headlines when he spoke out on AI after an AI generated song went viral featuring his voice over a track by some lady called Ice Spice. He stated, "This is the final straw AI..." as if he was personally taking on an AI model in a rap battle. However, it's clear that AI-generated music is only going to become a common trend, and it may give the average person the power to create hit songs without spending tons of money on studio recording. Whether this is a good thing or not isn’t for me to decide. You could argue that it takes away from the creativity and artistry of the music industry, while regular folks see it as a way to get their own recognition. I was informed the other day by [JCN](https://www.jcnoel.dev) that over 1 million songs are released each year, so I can only expect that number to increase dramatically with AI generated music becoming more readily available to creators. Regardless, AI is taking a toll on the creative industry. I can only imagine more artists will be coming out against AI generated music, and it will be interesting to see how this trend plays out in the coming weeks and months. As for me, I can't help but find it all a bit hilarious.

title: New stuff!
content:
Today's been good. I added a lil' image to my site, and made it rotate, lol. Probably won't be keeping it up on there because it's quite distracting. If anything, I will possibly lower the speed of it and see how that looks. I have to go spend some time with the family though, as I have been spending all of my time creating this site. Off to the garage for a toke, and then its lego time. 

-Peace
